metadata.description: The reconstruction of the craton by the mantle plume and its subsequent dynamic effects are important scientific issues related to the formation and evolution of the craton. Emeishan Large Igneous Province is located in the western margin of Yangtze craton, which is an ideal window to study the effect of mantle plume on craton reformation. With the support of the national key research and development program "Deep Process and Resource Effect of Important Yanshanian Events" (Grant 2016YFC0600400), the mantle deformation characteristics of Emeishan Large Igneous Province were obtained by using teleseismic shear wave (sks, SKKS and PKS) splitting; Combined with the wave velocity structure, geothermal flow and volcanic rock distribution, it reveals the strengthening effect of mantle plume on the craton and the profound influence of the strengthened lithosphere on the present deep process of the southeastern margin of the Qinghai Tibet Plateau; At the same time, it also provides a new perspective for further understanding the origin of seismic anisotropy at the top of the upper mantle and asthenosphere demonstrator interaction.
metadata.descriptionCn: 地幔柱对克拉通的改造及后续动力学效应是关系到克拉通形成和演化的重要科学问题。峨眉山大火成岩省位于扬子克拉通西缘，是研究地幔柱对克拉通改造效应的理想窗口。在燕山期重大地质事件的深部过程与资源效应（专题号 2016YFC0600400）支持下，利用远震剪切波(SKS,SKKS和PKS)分裂获得了峨眉山大火成岩省地幔变形特征；结合波速结构、大地热流和火山岩分布等，揭示了地幔柱作用对克拉通的强化效应，以及强化的岩石圈对青藏高原东南缘现今深部过程的深刻影响；同时，也为深入认识上地幔顶部地震各向异性的起源以及软流圈-演示圈相互作用提供了新的视角。

background: Tectonic plate motion and mantle convection deform the Earth's mantle, and the resultant orientations of the crystalline lattices of mantle minerals can be inferred from seismic anisotropy (Park & Levin, 2002). Shear-wave splitting of seismic phases converted at the core-mantle boundary (CMB) (such as SKS, SKKS, and PKS, hereinafter referred to as XKS) is used to determine the orientation (inferred from the polarization φ of the fast wave) and the strength (inferred from the delay time δt of the slow wave) of the apparent anisotropy integrated from the CMB to the surface along the raypath and provides insights into the mantle dynamics (Savage, 1999; Silver, 1996). The India-Asia continental collision and shortening in the Cenozoic have driven the lateral extrusion of the Tibetan Plateau along the Ailao Shan–Red River Fault (ARF) in the west Yunnan, SW China (e.g., Chung et al., 1997; Tapponnier et al., 1982) (Figure 1a), and distinct crustal deformations occurred conspicuously across the ARF. Intense E–W shortening occurred to the west of the ARF, and three main sutures (Indus-Yarlung Suture [IYS], Bangong-Nujiang Suture [BNS], and Jinsha Suture [JS]) spanning a width of ∼600 km in central Tibet are shrunken into a narrow zone of ∼200 km in the Three-River Orogenic Zone (TRZ) (Figure 1a).
research objective: To address these questions, we performed shear-wave splitting analysis using data from a dense linear E–W trending seismic array (COMPASS-ELIP) across the west Yunnan. Seismic anisotropic features identified in this study provide evidence for the interaction between the Cenozoic Tibetan mantle flow and the western Yangtze Craton. At the same time, they yield new insights into the nature of seismic anisotropy in the lithosphere–asthenosphere transition when integrated with geological observations.
methods: The COMPASS-ELIP seismic array was deployed nearly along ∼27°N latitude with the profile length of ∼850 km and average station spacing of ∼15 km. Data from 58 broadband seismic stations of the experiment are processed in this study after removing the instrument responses (Reftek-130 dataloggers and Güralp CMG-3ESP seismometers with the frequency range from 30/60 s to 50 Hz). In this study, we conduct a surface wave polarization analysis to estimate possible sensor misorientations (Baker & Stevens, 2004; Stachnik et al., 2012). After the sensor orientation correction, waveforms from events with Mw ≥ 5.5 at epicentral distances of 85°–180°, which include all XKS phases sufficiently, are selected and band-pass filtered in 0.04–0.5 Hz to enhance the signal-to-noise ratio (SNR) for the following analysis (Gao & Liu, 2009). We use the SplitLab software package to perform the shear-wave splitting analysis for each XKS phase which can be distinguished clearly in the waveforms (Wüstefeld et al., 2008). Based on reliable splitting measurements, we calculate the station-averaged splitting by stacking the normalized energy maps of individual XKS analysis from the SC method (Wolfe & Silver, 1998), and a statistical F test is conducted to obtain the 95% confidence interval (Silver & Chan, 1991) as a proxy for the corresponding errors (Figure S3).
dataset: Data from 58 broadband seismic stations of the experiment are processed in this study after removing the instrument responses (Reftek-130 dataloggers and Güralp CMG-3ESP seismometers with the frequency range from 30/60 s to 50 Hz).
findings: One of the most prominent features in our result is a N–S-oriented strong anisotropic zone (stations E14–E19) that appears abruptly between the TRZ and the INZ of the Emeishan LIP, exhibiting a maximum δt of ∼1.5 s in the center that delays to ∼0.5 s on the flanks. Therefore, the spatial correlation of potassic magmatism and strong mantle anisotropy lends the strong supports to the interaction between the southward mantle flow in the asthenosphere, associated with the Cenozoic continental extrusion of the Tibetan Plateau, and the plume-strengthened lithosphere beneath the westernmost Yangtze Craton.
backgroundCn: 构造板块运动和地幔对流使地球的地幔发生变形，地幔矿物的晶体晶格的结果取向可以通过地震各向异性推断得出（Park & Levin, 2002）。利用在地核-地幔边界（CMB）转换的剪切波分裂（如SKS、SKKS和PKS，以下简称XKS）来确定各向异性的取向（从快波的极化φ推断）和强度（从慢波的延迟时间δt推断），这些信息是沿着射线路径从CMB到地表的综合结果，并为地幔动力学提供了见解（Savage, 1999; Silver, 1996）。印度-亚洲大陆碰撞和新生代的缩短驱动了西云南的红河-哀牢山断裂（ARF）沿线的西藏高原的横向挤出（例如，Chung et al., 1997; Tapponnier et al., 1982）（图1a），并且在ARF附近发生了明显的不同的地壳变形。在ARF以西发生了强烈的东西向缩短，横跨约600公里的中央西藏的三条主要缝合线（印度-雅鲁藏布缝合线[IYS]、班公-怒江缝合线[BNS]和金沙缝合线[JS]）被压缩成约200公里宽的三江造山带（TRZ）区域（图1a）。
research objectiveCn: 为了回答这些问题，我们使用来自西云南密集线性东西向地震阵列（COMPASS-ELIP）的数据进行了剪切波分裂分析。本研究中识别的地震各向异性特征为新生代青藏高原地幔流与西扬子克拉通之间的相互作用提供了证据。同时，当与地质观察相结合时，它们为岩石圈-软流圈过渡区的地震各向异性的性质提供了新的见解。
methodsCn: COMPASS-ELIP地震阵列沿着大约27°N纬度部署，剖面长度约为850公里，平均站间距约为15公里。本研究处理了实验中58个宽频地震台站的数据，去除了仪器响应（Reftek-130数据记录仪和Güralp CMG-3ESP地震仪，频率范围从30/60秒到50赫兹）。本研究进行表面波偏振分析，以估计可能的传感器误向（Baker & Stevens, 2004; Stachnik et al., 2012）。在传感器方向校正后，选择了震中距离为85°–180°、震级Mw ≥ 5.5的事件波形，这些事件包含所有XKS相，并在0.04–0.5赫兹范围内进行带通滤波，以增强信噪比（SNR）以便进行后续分析（Gao & Liu, 2009）。我们使用SplitLab软件包对每个XKS相进行剪切波分裂分析，这些相在波形中可以清晰区分（Wüstefeld et al., 2008）。基于可靠的分裂测量，我们通过堆叠个别XKS分析的归一化能量图，计算站点平均分裂，并进行统计F检验，以获得95%的置信区间（Silver & Chan, 1991），作为相应误差的代理（图S3）。
datasetCn: 本研究处理了58个宽带地震台站的数据，去除了仪器响应（Reftek-130数据记录仪和Güralp CMG-3ESP地震仪，频率范围从30/60秒到50赫兹）。
findingsCn: 我们结果中最显著的特征之一是一个南北方向的强各向异性区域（站点E14–E19），该区域在Emeishan大火成岩省的TRZ和INZ之间突然出现，中心的最大δt约为1.5秒，向两侧延迟至约0.5秒。因此，钾质岩浆活动与强地幔各向异性之间的空间相关性强烈支持了与青藏 Plateau的中新世大陆挤压相关的南向地幔流动与位于最西部扬子克拉通下方的火山喷发增强的岩石圈之间的相互作用。

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method for measuring seismic anisotropy in the Earth's mantle?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个测量地球地幔中地震各向异性的 数据收集方法的示例？
Example.AnswerEn: One data collection method involves deploying a dense linear seismic array, such as the COMPASS-ELIP, across a geological region of interest. This method includes using broadband seismic stations equipped with Reftek-130 dataloggers and Güralp CMG-3ESP seismometers, which capture seismic waveforms from events with magnitudes Mw ≥ 5.5 at epicentral distances of 85°–180°.
Example.AnswerCn: 一种数据收集方法是在感兴趣的地质区域部署密集的线性地震阵列，例如COMPASS-ELIP。该方法包括使用配备Reftek-130数据记录仪和Güralp CMG-3ESP地震仪的宽频地震站，捕捉来自震中距离为85°–180°、震级Mw ≥ 5.5的事件的地震波形。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a technique used to enhance the signal-to-noise ratio (SNR) in seismic data analysis?
Example.QuestionCn: 在地震数据分析中，用于增强信噪比（SNR）的一个技术示例是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a technique to enhance SNR is band-pass filtering seismic waveforms in the frequency range of 0.04–0.5 Hz, as done in the analysis of waveforms from XKS phases. This filtering helps clarify the seismic signals for further analysis, such as shear-wave splitting.
Example.AnswerCn: 增强信噪比的一种技术是对地震波形进行带通滤波，频率范围为0.04–0.5 Hz，正如在XKS相的波形分析中所做的那样。这种滤波有助于澄清地震信号，以便进行进一步分析，例如剪切波分裂。

Example.QuestionEn: Please provide an example of how sensor misorientations are corrected in seismic data collection.
Example.QuestionCn: 请提供一个如何在地震数据采集中校正传感器误向的例子。
Example.AnswerEn: Sensor misorientations in seismic data collection can be corrected using surface wave polarization analysis, as exemplified in the COMPASS-ELIP seismic array study. This analysis helps to estimate and adjust the orientation of the sensors to ensure accurate data collection.
Example.AnswerCn: 在地震数据采集中，传感器的误向可以通过表面波极化分析进行修正，正如COMPASS-ELIP地震阵列研究所示。这种分析有助于估计和调整传感器的方向，以确保数据采集的准确性。

Feature Specification.AnswerEn: 58 broadband seismic stations, Reftek-130 dataloggers, Güralp CMG-3ESP seismometers, frequency range 30/60 s to 50 Hz, events with Mw ≥ 5.5, epicentral distances 85°–180°
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 58个宽频地震台站，Reftek-130数据记录仪，Güralp CMG-3ESP地震仪，频率范围30/60秒至50赫兹，震级Mw ≥ 5.5的事件，震中距85°–180°。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the key features of the shear-wave splitting technique used in mantle dynamics studies?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 剪切波分裂技术在地幔动力学研究中的关键特征有哪些？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: XKS phases (SKS, SKKS, PKS), orientation and strength of seismic anisotropy, station-averaged splitting, normalized energy maps, statistical tests for confidence intervals
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: XKS阶段（SKS、SKKS、PKS）、地震各向异性的方向和强度、台站平均分裂、归一化能量图、置信区间的统计检验

Feature Specification.AnswerEn: orientation of the fast wave polarization, delay time of the slow wave
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 快波偏振方向，慢波延迟时间

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'broadband seismic station' refer to in the context of seismic data collection and analysis?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在地震数据收集和分析的背景下，“宽频地震台站”指的是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: A broadband seismic station refers to a setup that includes equipment capable of recording a wide range of seismic frequencies, typically using instruments like Reftek-130 dataloggers and Güralp CMG-3ESP seismometers, which are used to capture seismic data over a frequency range from 30/60 seconds to 50 Hz.
Definition.AnswerCn: 宽频地震台站是指一种设备设置，能够记录广泛的地震频率，通常使用像Reftek-130数据记录仪和Güralp CMG-3ESP地震仪这样的仪器，这些仪器用于捕捉频率范围从30/60秒到50赫兹的地震数据。

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the significance of 'surface wave polarization analysis' in correcting sensor orientations?
Definition.QuestionCn: “表面波极化分析”在校正传感器方向中的重要性是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: Surface wave polarization analysis is used to estimate and correct possible sensor misorientations in seismic data collection. This ensures accurate recording of seismic waves by correcting the orientation of sensors, which is crucial for enhancing the reliability of subsequent analyses such as shear-wave splitting.
Definition.AnswerCn: 表面波极化分析用于估计和修正地震数据采集中的传感器误方向。这确保了地震波的准确记录，通过修正传感器的方向，这对增强后续分析（如剪切波分裂）的可靠性至关重要。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How does the data collection method using a dense linear seismic array compare to other seismic data collection techniques in terms of capturing mantle anisotropy?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 使用密集线性地震阵列的数据收集方法在捕捉地幔各向异性方面与其他地震数据收集技术相比如何？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The data collection method using the COMPASS-ELIP seismic array involves deploying stations nearly along a specific latitude with a defined spacing, focusing on capturing shear-wave splitting to study mantle anisotropy. This approach is detailed in the field, emphasizing its ability to provide insights into mantle dynamics through broadband seismic stations. In contrast, other techniques may not use such dense spatial coverage or specific shear-wave analysis, potentially impacting the resolution and detail of anisotropic features captured.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 使用COMPASS-ELIP地震阵的数据收集方法涉及在特定纬度上以定义的间距部署站点，重点捕捉剪切波分裂以研究地幔各向异性。这种方法在现场得到了详细说明，强调其通过宽频地震站提供对地幔动力学的洞察能力。相比之下，其他技术可能不使用如此密集的空间覆盖或特定的剪切波分析，这可能会影响捕捉到的各向异性特征的分辨率和细节。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How might the deployment and configuration of seismic stations in a linear E–W trending array influence the interpretation of seismic anisotropy in the region?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 东西向线性排列的地震站的部署和配置如何影响该地区地震各向异性的解释？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The deployment of seismic stations in a linear E–W trending array allows for detailed analysis of seismic anisotropic features and offers evidence for the interaction between mantle flows and craton structures. The configuration helps in assessing the anisotropy strength and orientation, which is critical for understanding lithosphere-asthenosphere interactions.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 在东西方向线性排列的地震站部署可以详细分析地震各向异性特征，并提供地幔流动与克拉通结构之间相互作用的证据。这种配置有助于评估各向异性的强度和方向，这对于理解岩石圈-软流圈之间的相互作用至关重要。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: In what ways can the integration of seismic anisotropy data with geological observations enhance the understanding of the lithosphere-asthenosphere transition?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 将地震各向异性数据与地质观测相结合，可以通过哪些方式增强对岩石圈-软流圈过渡的理解？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Integrating seismic anisotropy data with geological observations provides a comprehensive view of the lithosphere-asthenosphere transition. It yields new insights into the nature of seismic anisotropy and helps in understanding the crust-mantle interactions, which are pivotal for elucidating the processes influencing the region's tectonic evolution.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 整合地震各向异性数据与地质观察提供了对岩石圈-软流圈过渡的全面视角。这为理解地震各向异性的性质提供了新的见解，并有助于理解地壳与地幔之间的相互作用，这对于阐明影响该地区构造演化的过程至关重要。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes discrepancies in the measurement of seismic anisotropy across different stations in a dataset?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 导致不同站点测量地震各向异性差异的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Discrepancies can arise from sensor misorientations, which are addressed through surface wave polarization analysis to estimate and correct possible sensor misorientations. Additionally, variations in the local geological structures or mantle flow can contribute to differences in seismic anisotropy measurements.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 传感器的误向可能导致差异，这通过表面波极化分析来估计和修正可能的传感器误向。此外，局部地质结构或地幔流动的变化也可能导致地震各向异性测量的差异。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is it important to use a specific frequency range when filtering seismic data during data collection?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在数据采集过程中，使用特定频率范围过滤地震数据的重要性是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Using a specific frequency range, such as 0.04–0.5 Hz, is crucial to enhance the signal-to-noise ratio (SNR) for seismic wave analysis. This filtering helps in isolating the relevant seismic phases (such as XKS) and improving the clarity and reliability of the data for subsequent analysis.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 使用特定的频率范围，例如0.04–0.5 Hz，对于增强地震波分析的信噪比（SNR）至关重要。这种滤波有助于隔离相关的地震相（如XKS），并提高数据的清晰度和可靠性，以便进行后续分析。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What are the causes behind the selection of certain epicentral distances and magnitudes in seismic data collection methods?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在地震数据收集方法中，选择特定震中距离和震级的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Epicentral distances of 85°–180° and magnitudes of Mw ≥ 5.5 are selected to ensure all XKS phases are sufficiently included and to capture significant seismic events that provide clear waveforms for analysis. This selection helps in obtaining reliable shear-wave splitting measurements necessary for understanding mantle dynamics.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 选择85°–180°的震中距离和Mw ≥ 5.5的震级，以确保充分包含所有XKS相，并捕捉到提供清晰波形的重大地震事件。这一选择有助于获得可靠的剪切波分裂测量，进而理解地幔动力学。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential outcomes of utilizing shear-wave splitting analysis on seismic data collected from a dense linear seismic array in understanding mantle dynamics?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 利用密集线性地震阵列收集的地震数据进行剪切波分裂分析以理解地幔动力学的潜在结果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Utilizing shear-wave splitting analysis on seismic data from a dense linear seismic array can provide evidence for the interaction between mantle flow and a craton, yielding insights into the nature of seismic anisotropy in the lithosphere-asthenosphere transition.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 利用密集线性地震阵列的剪切波分裂分析，可以提供关于地幔流动与克拉通之间相互作用的证据，从而深入了解岩石圈-软流圈过渡区的地震各向异性特征。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How does the selection of seismic events with specific magnitude and epicentral distances impact the findings related to mantle anisotropy?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 选择具有特定震级和震中距离的地震事件如何影响与地幔各向异性相关的研究结果？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Selecting seismic events with magnitude ≥ 5.5 and epicentral distances of 85°–180° ensures that all XKS phases are sufficiently included, which enhances the signal-to-noise ratio, thereby allowing clear differentiation of waveforms and reliable measurement of shear-wave splitting, revealing strong anisotropic zones and interaction with mantle flows.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 选择震级≥5.5且震中距离为85°–180°的地震事件，确保所有XKS相位都被充分包含，这增强了信噪比，从而允许清晰区分波形和可靠测量剪切波分裂，揭示强各向异性区域和与地幔流动的相互作用。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What effects might arise from addressing sensor misorientations in data collection methods on the reliability of seismic anisotropy measurements?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 解决数据收集方法中的传感器误向问题可能对地震各向异性测量的可靠性产生哪些影响？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Addressing sensor misorientations in data collection methods can improve the accuracy of seismic anisotropy measurements, ensuring reliable splitting measurements which are crucial for calculating station-averaged splitting and understanding mantle dynamics, as reflected by the statistical confidence intervals obtained.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 解决数据收集方法中的传感器误向问题可以提高地震各向异性测量的准确性，确保可靠的分裂测量，这对于计算站点平均分裂和理解地幔动力学至关重要，这一点在获得的统计置信区间中得以体现。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What are the procedures for ensuring sensor orientation accuracy during the deployment of a seismic array for mantle deformation studies?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在部署用于地幔变形研究的地震阵列时，确保传感器方向准确性的程序是什么？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: A surface wave polarization analysis is conducted to estimate possible sensor misorientations. After this analysis, waveforms are corrected for sensor orientation errors to ensure data accuracy.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 进行表面波极化分析以估计可能的传感器误向。在此分析之后，对波形进行传感器方向误差的修正，以确保数据的准确性。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How is shear-wave splitting analysis conducted using data from seismic stations to study mantle dynamics?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 如何利用地震台站的数据进行剪切波分裂分析，以研究地幔动力学？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Shear-wave splitting analysis is conducted using the SplitLab software package for each XKS phase distinguished in the waveforms. The procedure involves band-pass filtering waveforms from events with sufficient magnitude and epicentral distance, followed by calculating station-averaged splitting by stacking normalized energy maps and conducting a statistical F test for confidence intervals.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 剪切波分裂分析使用SplitLab软件包对波形中区分出的每个XKS相进行。该过程包括对具有足够震级和震中距离的事件的波形进行带通滤波，随后通过堆叠归一化能量图并进行统计F检验以获得置信区间，计算站点平均分裂。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What steps are involved in processing seismic data from broadband stations to analyze mantle anisotropy?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 从宽频地震台站处理地震数据以分析地幔各向异性的步骤有哪些？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The steps involve removing instrument responses from the data collected at broadband stations, selecting waveforms from suitable seismic events, band-pass filtering to enhance the signal-to-noise ratio, and performing shear-wave splitting analysis to determine seismic anisotropy characteristics.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 步骤包括从宽频台站收集的数据中去除仪器响应，选择合适的地震事件波形，进行带通滤波以增强信噪比，以及进行剪切波分裂分析以确定地震各向异性特征。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How does the integration of specific seismic data enable the understanding of mantle dynamics and lithosphere-asthenosphere interaction?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 特定地震数据的整合如何促进对地幔动力学和岩石圈-软流圈相互作用的理解？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Shear-wave splitting analysis using data from a dense seismic array provides evidence of seismic anisotropic features, offering insights into mantle flow dynamics and the nature of seismic anisotropy in the lithosphere-asthenosphere transition.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 使用来自密集地震阵列的数据进行剪切波分裂分析提供了地震各向异性特征的证据，揭示了地幔流动动态以及岩石圈-软流圈过渡区中地震各向异性的性质。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What technological advancements have enabled the detection and analysis of shear-wave splitting in seismic studies?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些技术进步使得在地震研究中能够检测和分析剪切波分裂？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The use of SplitLab software to perform shear-wave splitting analysis, alongside the deployment of broadband seismic stations and advanced data processing techniques like surface wave polarization analysis, enables the detection and analysis of shear-wave splitting in seismic studies.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 使用SplitLab软件进行剪切波分裂分析，以及部署宽频地震站和先进的数据处理技术，如表面波极化分析，使得在地震研究中能够检测和分析剪切波分裂。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might data from broadband seismic stations require specific preprocessing steps before analysis?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 为什么来自宽频地震台站的数据在分析之前可能需要特定的预处理步骤？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Data from broadband seismic stations need preprocessing to remove instrument responses and correct any sensor misorientations to ensure accurate shear-wave splitting analysis and enhance the signal-to-noise ratio for reliable results.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 宽频地震台的数据需要预处理，以去除仪器响应并纠正任何传感器的误向，以确保准确的剪切波分裂分析，并提高信噪比以获得可靠的结果。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What challenges might arise in the accurate processing of seismic data from broadband stations, and how can these be addressed according to methodologies used in the field?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在宽频地震台站的地震数据准确处理过程中可能出现哪些挑战，以及如何根据该领域使用的方法来解决这些挑战？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Challenges in processing seismic data include ensuring correct sensor orientations and enhancing signal-to-noise ratios. These can be addressed by conducting surface wave polarization analysis to estimate sensor misorientations and applying band-pass filtering to improve SNR for analysis.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 处理地震数据的挑战包括确保传感器的正确方向和增强信噪比。可以通过进行表面波极化分析来估计传感器的误方向，并应用带通滤波来改善信噪比以进行分析。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In what ways could the methods used for data collection in the COMPASS-ELIP study be refined or expanded to enhance understanding of mantle anisotropy and related geological phenomena?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在COMPASS-ELIP研究中，数据收集的方法可以通过哪些方式进行改进或扩展，以增强对地幔各向异性及相关地质现象的理解？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Refinements could include increasing the density of seismic stations for more detailed spatial resolution, employing additional geophysical methods like magnetotellurics, and integrating more extensive geological datasets to better correlate seismic anisotropy with surface geological features.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 改进措施可以包括增加地震站的密度以获得更详细的空间分辨率，采用额外的地球物理方法如电磁测深，并整合更广泛的地质数据集，以更好地将地震各向异性与地表地质特征相关联。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don’t understand how a dataset from seismic stations can accurately reflect mantle dynamics through shear-wave splitting analysis.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白来自地震站的数据集如何通过剪切波分裂分析准确反映地幔动力学。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The dataset from 58 broadband seismic stations is processed to remove instrument responses and includes data from XKS phases, which are crucial for determining mantle dynamics through shear-wave splitting. The analysis involves correcting sensor orientations and selecting waveforms from events with significant magnitudes to enhance signal-to-noise ratios, enabling accurate reflection of mantle anisotropy.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 来自58个宽频地震站的数据经过处理，以去除仪器响应，并包括XKS相的数据，这对于通过剪切波分裂确定地幔动力学至关重要。分析涉及校正传感器方向，并选择具有显著震级的事件波形，以提高信噪比，从而准确反映地幔各向异性。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I'm unsure how the data collection method can handle potential sensor misorientations effectively in seismic studies.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不确定数据收集方法如何有效处理地震研究中的潜在传感器误向问题。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Surface wave polarization analysis is employed to estimate possible sensor misorientations, which are crucial for ensuring data accuracy in seismic studies. After correcting sensor orientations, the data can then be reliably used for further analysis, such as shear-wave splitting, to study mantle dynamics.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 表面波极化分析用于估计可能的传感器误向，这对于确保地震研究中的数据准确性至关重要。在校正传感器方向后，数据可以可靠地用于进一步分析，例如剪切波分裂，以研究地幔动力学。
